posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

7 cards remain.  $215 shipped, or best offer.

Am looking to sell my Toronto team set of C46s.  Am pricing them for individual sale.  Prices include shipping; PayPal preferred.

All scans can be seen here: [url]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/[/url].

Prices below:

OHara - $40
Rudolph - $30
Smith - $35
Fitzpatrick - $35
Kocher - $40
Shaw - $45
Jordan - $30

Email or PM me if you're interested.

Regards,

Richard.

Bumping thread to reflect sales (and just removed sold from list to clear it up).  Dropped some prices too...feel free to make an offer if you're interested in something.  I'm going to the PO this week anyway...maybe you can save me a trip ;)

Regards,

Richard.

Bump.  Will sell remaining 7 cards as a group for $215 shipped (OBO).

Regards,

Richard.
